title: Crafttweaker报错
author: xiyg
txt_content:
哇这是真的看不懂, 不知道哪里错了.(1.10.2版本, 支持/mt reload)
print("Initializing CraftingRecipes...");


recipes.addShaped(<minecraft:diamond>,
        [[<minecraft:iron_ingot>,<minecraft:iron_ingot>,<minecraft:iron_ingot>],
        [                             null,<minecraft:iron_ingot>,                             null],
        [<minecraft:iron_ingot>,<minecraft:iron_ingot>,<minecraft:iron_ingot>]]
);        


print("Initialized CraftingRecipes");

SERVER_STARTED][SERVER][INFO] tried to remove command: tooltips failed. THIS IS NOT AN ERROR!
[SERVER_STARTED][SERVER][ERROR] Error loading CraftingRecipes.zs: stanhebben.zenscript.parser.TokenException: Invalid character at null:1 - ?
stanhebben.zenscript.parser.TokenException: Invalid character at null:1 - ?
        at stanhebben.zenscript.parser.TokenStream.advanceToken(TokenStream.java:229)
        at stanhebben.zenscript.parser.TokenStream.advance(TokenStream.java:194)
        at stanhebben.zenscript.parser.TokenStream.<init>(TokenStream.java:52)
        at stanhebben.zenscript.ZenTokener.<init>(ZenTokener.java:132)
        at minetweaker.runtime.MTTweaker.load(MTTweaker.java:120)
        at minetweaker.MineTweakerImplementationAPI.reload(MineTweakerImplementationAPI.java:508)
        at minetweaker.MineTweakerImplementationAPI.lambda$static$0(MineTweakerImplementationAPI.java:70)
        at minetweaker.MineTweakerImplementationAPI$3.execute(MineTweakerImplementationAPI.java:493)
        at minetweaker.mc1102.server.MCServer$MCCommand.func_184881_a(MCServer.java:110)
        at net.minecraft.command.CommandHandler.func_175786_a(CommandHandler.java:104)
        at net.minecraft.command.CommandHandler.func_71556_a(CommandHandler.java:83)
        at net.minecraft.network.NetHandlerPlayServer.func_147361_d(NetHandlerPlayServer.java:913)
        at net.minecraft.network.NetHandlerPlayServer.func_147354_a(NetHandlerPlayServer.java:892)
        at net.minecraft.network.play.client.CPacketChatMessage.func_148833_a(SourceFile:37)
        at net.minecraft.network.play.client.CPacketChatMessage.func_148833_a(SourceFile:9)
        at net.minecraft.network.PacketThreadUtil$1.run(SourceFile:13)
        at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Unknown Source)
        at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source)
        at net.minecraft.util.Util.func_181617_a(SourceFile:45)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71190_q(MinecraftServer.java:668)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71217_p(MinecraftServer.java:613)

        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

replies.txt_content: 由于"..."导致的crash 删除应该能解决问题

replies.author: xiyg
replies.txt_content:
1012723234 发表于 2018-4-21 09:57
由于"..."导致的crash 删除应该能解决问题
等等,我好像已经解决了.... 总之, 谢谢你的回答!

xiyg 发表于 2018-4-21 10:04
等等,我好像已经解决了.... 总之, 谢谢你的回答!
你是怎么解决的啊，求助，我也就写了个很简单的也报错

replies.author: xiyg
replies.txt_content:
674996392 发表于 2018-5-6 08:55
你是怎么解决的啊，求助，我也就写了个很简单的也报错
注意你的编码格式:UTF-8, 然后是英文式的标点符号(后面要加空格), 
看看酒石酸的视频 https://www.bilibili.com/video/av13038655
